import React, { Component } from 'react' import MY_SERVICE from '../../services' import { Card, Form, Input, Button } from 'antd' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export default class Signup extends Component { state = { user: {} } handeleInput = (e) => { const { user } = this.state const key = e.target.name user[key] = e.target.value this.setState({ user }) } onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() MY_SERVICE.signup(this.state.user) .then((response) => this.props.history.push('/login')) .catch((err) => console.log(err)) } render() { return (
Have an account
) } }
